short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all incidences of Russian with British.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the words  'Russia' and 'Russian' with 'British' on all web pages in order to feel less depressed about the ongoing Russian election interference scandals.
